title: Booked invoice schema
description: A schema for retrieving a booked invoice.

bookedInvoiceNumber.description: A reference number for the booked invoice document.

date.description: Invoice issue date. Format according to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

currency.description: The ISO 4217 currency code of the invoice.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the invoice currency and the base currency of the agreement. The exchange rate expresses how much it will cost in base currency to buy 100 units of the invoice currency.

netAmount.description: The total invoice amount in the invoice currency before all taxes and discounts have been applied. For a credit note this amount will be negative.

netAmountInBaseCurrency.description: The total invoice amount in the base currency of the agreement before all taxes and discounts have been applied. For a credit note this amount will be negative.

grossAmount.description: The total invoice amount in the invoice currency after all taxes and discounts have been applied. For a credit note this amount will be negative.

grossAmountInBaseCurrency.description: The total invoice amount in the base currency of the agreement after all taxes and discounts have been applied. For a credit note this amount will be negative.

vatAmount.description: The total amount of VAT on the invoice in the invoice currency. This will have the same sign as net amount

roundingAmount.description: The total rounding error, if any, on the invoice in base currency.

remainderInBaseCurrency.description: Remaining amount to be paid in base currency.

dueDate.description: The date the invoice is due for payment. Only used if the terms of payment is of type 'duedate', in which case it is mandatory. Format according to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

paymentTerms.description: The terms of payment for the invoice.

paymentTermsNumber.description: A unique identifier of the payment term.

daysOfCredit.description: The number of days of credit on the invoice. This field is only valid if terms of payment is not of type 'duedate

name.description: The name of the payment terms.

self.description: A unique reference to the payment term resource.

customerNumber.description: The customer number is a positive unique numerical identifier with a maximum of 9 digits.

self.description: A unique reference to the customer resource.

recipient.description: The actual recipient of the invoice. This may be the same info found on the customer (and will probably be so in most cases) but it may also be a different recipient. For instance, the customer placing the order may be ACME Headquarters, but the recipient of the invoice may be ACME IT.

name.description: The name of the actual recipient.

address.description: The street address of the actual recipient.

zip.description: The zip code of the actual recipient.

city.description: The city of the actual recipient.

country.description: The country of the actual recipient.

ean.description: The 'European Article Number' of the actual recipient.

publicEntryNumber.description: The public entry number of the actual recipient.

attention.description: The person to whom this invoice is addressed.

customerContactNumber.description: Unique identifier of the customer employee.

self.description: A unique reference to the customer employee.

vatZoneNumber.description: Unique identifier of the vat zone.

self.description: A unique reference to the vat zone.

cvr.description: The Corporate Identification Number of the recipient for example CVR in Denmark.

deliveryLocation.description: A reference to the place of delivery for the goods on the invoice

deliveryLocationNumber.description: A unique identifier for the delivery location.

self.description: A unique reference to the delivery location resource.

address.description: Street address where the goods must be delivered to the customer.

zip.description: The zip code of the place of delivery.

city.description: The city of the place of delivery

country.description: The country of the place of delivery

deliveryTerms.description: Details about the terms of delivery.

heading.description: The invoice heading. Usually displayed at the top of the invoice.

textLine1.description: The first line of supplementary text on the invoice. This is usually displayed right under the heading in a smaller font.

textLine2.description: The second line of supplementary text in the notes on the invoice. This is usually displayed as a footer on the invoice.

references.description: Customer and company references related to this invoice.

customerContact.description: The customer contact is a reference to the employee at the customer to contact regarding the invoice.

customerContactNumber.description: Unique identifier of the customer contact.

self.description: A unique reference to the customer contact resource.

salesPerson.description: The sales person is a reference to the employee who sold the goods on the invoice. This is also the person who is credited with this sale in reports.

self.description: A unique reference to the employee resource.

vendorReference.description: A reference to any second employee involved in the sale.

self.description: A unique reference to the employee resource.

other.description: A text field that can be used to save any custom reference on the invoice.

pdf.description: References a pdf representation of this invoice.

self.description: The unique reference of the pdf representation for this booked invoice.

layout.description: Layout to be applied for this invoice.

layoutNumber.description: The unique identifier of the layout.

self.description: A unique link reference to the layout item.

projectNumber.description: A unique identifier of the project.

self.description: A unique reference to the project resource.

lines.title: Invoice lines
lines.description: An array containing the specific invoice lines.

items.description: An array of the invoice lines that make up the invoice.

lineNumber.description: The line number is a unique number within the invoice.

sortKey.description: A sort key used to sort the lines in ascending order within the invoice.

description.description: A description of the product or service sold.

deliveryDate.description: Invoice delivery date. The date is formatted according to ISO-8601.

quantity.description: The number of units of goods on the invoice line.

unitNetPrice.description: The price of 1 unit of the goods or services on the invoice line in the invoice currency.

discountPercentage.description: A line discount expressed as a percentage.

unitCostPrice.description: The cost price of 1 unit of the goods or services in the invoice currency.

vatRate.description: The VAT rate in % used to calculate the vat amount on this line.

vatAmount.description: The total amount of VAT on the invoice line in the invoice currency. This will have the same sign as total net amount

totalNetAmount.description: The total invoice line amount in the invoice currency before all taxes and discounts have been applied. For a credit note this amount will be negative.

unit.description: The unit of measure applied to the invoice line.

unitNumber.description: The unique identifier of the unit.

name.description: The name of the unit (e.g. 'kg' for weight or 'l' for volume).

self.description: A unique reference to the unit resource.

product.description: The product or service offered on the invoice line.

productNumber.description: The unique product number. This can be a stock keeping unit identifier (SKU).

self.description: A unique reference to the product resource.

departmentalDistributionNumber.description: A unique identifier of the departmental distribution.

self.description: A unique reference to the departmental distribution resource.

sent.description: A convenience link to see if the invoice has been sent or not.

self.description: The unique self reference of the booked invoice.
